abstract_ssm: This collection pertains to a Village of Brooklyn, N.Y. Municipal Court case involving Alexander William Marr and Elias Taylor against Joseph Sprague and Andrew Demarest, administrators of the estate of Aaron S. Robbins. It consists of a bill of debt incurred by Robbins at Marr and Taylor's tavern from August 1825 through July 1826.
subject_ssm: Court records -- New York (State) -- Kings County

subject_sim: Court records -- New York (State) -- Kings County
